author: arichardson
title: Wayne Rooney Manchester United record goalscorer: His 11 most important goals as he overtakes Sir Bobby Charlton and reaches 250
text:
EFL roon for more Wayne Rooney Manchester United record goalscorer: His 11 most important goals as he overtakes Sir Bobby Charlton and reaches 250 
Old Trafford skipper is now club's record goal scorer, and he has netted some vital strikes throughout 13-year spell at club By ANDREW RICHARDSON
